class.name: NuGetPackagesIndexer
class.description: A [build feature](https://confluence.jetbrains.com/display/TCDL/NuGet) to index *.nupkg files in build artifacts into TeamCity NuGet Feed.

param.name: feed
param.description: Specifies target TeamCity NuGet feed to add indexed packages in the following format: %externalProjectId%/%feedName%
